author: nflaig
content: Seems like Nimbus is the only client that has this flag already `--keymanager-token-file` (https://nimbus.guide/keymanager-api.html), might be hard to have the exact same flag name in all clients, as at least for Lodestar the flag would be part of `keymanager` group (not top level flag like jwt-secret). But at least the behavior of the flag should be the same, i.e. path to file, read token from that file, validate that token against what is sent in Authorization header (bearer scheme).
